      • setPlayerNickName

        public static void setPlayerNickName(UhcPlayer uhcPlayer,
                                     java.lang.String nickName)
        This method is used to change the player display name using ProtocolLib
        Parameters:
        uhcPlayer - The player you want to change the display-name for.
        nickName - The wanted nick-name, set to null to reset. (Make sure its not over 16 characters long!)

      • setPlayerHeaderFooter

        public static void setPlayerHeaderFooter(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                         java.lang.String header,
                                         java.lang.String footer)
        This method can be used to change the tab header and footer.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to change the header / footer for
        header - The new header
        footer - The new footer
